Source code for maxairesources.utilities.common_utils

import boto3
from urllib.parse import urlparse


[docs]def write_file_to_s3(data, path):
        parsed_path = urlparse(path, allow_fragments=False)
        s3 = boto3.client('s3')
        s3.put_object(
             Body=data,
             Bucket=parsed_path.netloc,
             Key= parsed_path.path.lstrip('/')
        )
